text: The Hits is a compilation by Ace of Base that was released in South Africa in late 2004. ==Track listing== # "Cruel Summer" # "All That She Wants" # "The Sign" # "C'est La Vie (Always 21)" # "Living In Danger" # "Everytime It Rains" # "Always Have Always Will" # "Wonderful Life" # "Don't Turn Around" # "Unspeakable" # "Lucky Love" # "Life Is A Flower" # "Love In December" # "Happy Nation" # "Beautiful Morning" # "Wheel Of Fortune" # "Never Gonna Say I'm Sorry" # "Beautiful Life" # "Hallo Hallo" # "Beautiful Morning" # "Unspeakable" Category:Ace of Base compilation albums Category:2004 compilation albums
title: The Hits (Ace of Base album)
